attributes.title: MY PHONE
attributes.review: I woke up to open my App Store and I saw this app I downloaded it and then I almost passed out seeing this orange figure in front of my face what do you think I was gonna do just stand there, I literally ran and threw my phone out the window. thanks a lot to this app.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my phone wouldn’t stop glitching. Ever five minutes my phone would let out a screeching sound. Everytime I open the app, the screeching would just get louder. I eventually had to delete the app!!! 0/10 DO NOT GET THIS APP 👎👎👎👎

attributes.title: I love democracy
attributes.review: I love it when the president of the United States and his supporters get their feelings  hurt when teenagers have more organization and power then them. So now that bunker boy realizes he has no power over them he’s starting to feel threatened by teenagers. Who’s the snowflake now?Baby Yoda 2020

attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever seen in my life! The glitches!! The bugs in the app, it’s infested. Do not download, I wish I never did. I take great offense to this app and needs to be deleted. It was a waste of space on my phone. Took ages to download, do not recommend for anyone.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is probably one of the worst things i’ve ever downloaded. when i opened the app it glitched and left a cheeto on my home screen for two hours without going away! i had to buy a new phone because of this app.

attributes.title: Disappointed and disgusted.
attributes.review: This app did NOT fail to disappoint me, it was like stubbing all of my toes on a flaming ottoman. I regret ever downloading it, and I don’t know if I will ever recover. Again I am FLABBERGASTED that this app was allowed on the App Store. I say it should be taken down immediately to evade any of people being traumatized. I am OUTRAGED!!!!

attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would...
attributes.review: I feel so attack right now. This app is detrimental and is harming my rights AS A HUMAN, and I DEMAND that I speak with the manager pls and thnx. I need the manager to FIRE this bigoted racist Cheeto AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. THIS GOES AGAINST MY CIVIL RIGHTS AND I DEMAND /MY/ JUSTEST IMMEDIATELY!!!!!!! Also masks are NOT killing god’s beautifully made breathing systems, dont you know????  ALSO!!! #blacklivesmatter :)

i opened the app to a NUDE fat odd shaped man then i came to realize it was a racist NUDE fat odd shaped man. it was trump. then i forgot he was a horrible man so i went to delete the app but it wouldn’t let me and it started to chant the n-word at me. 0/10 wouldn’t recommend unless you want it to call you the n-word

attributes.title: NO VERY DISTURBING
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and when I opened it it was a Cheeto in a suit waving and I was very disappointed and disturbed.I was having good intentions in mind but when I saw it I was just like no.I realized that the app was racist, VERY homophobic and it was just very disrespectful and discriminating and I was not happy with the idea of this app.

attributes.title: Ohh no!!🙊
attributes.review: I opened the app I had to restart my phone!!.  Everything is horribly organized in heree!  How can someone create such a horrible app to the point that I almost broke my phone in anger because everything got deleted off my device !!😡😡
